scripts.prepublish: echo '我要运行啦' && npm run build
scripts.mypub1: npm version major && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m && npm publish
scripts.mypub2: npm version minor && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m && npm publish
scripts.mypub3: npm version patch && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m && npm publish
